description:
This GUI explores various whether various adaptive optics control-related parameter can reach NASA's
Habitable Worlds Observatory mission requirement of 10 pm rms over 10 minutes, building off of Fig. 4 in
Douglas et al. 2019 (DOI: 10.3847/1538-3881/aaf385).
name: Adaptive Optics Control GUI for the Habitable Worlds Observatory
